definition[0]: if something lives on, it continues to exist
definition[1]: to have a particular amount of money to buy food and other necessary things
example[1]: I don’t know how they manage to live on £55 a week.
example[2]: the number of families who live on benefits
definition[2]: to eat a lot of a particular type of food
example[3]: They live on bread and potatoes.
example[4]: He practically lives on fish and chips!
